system.description:
You have merged the powers of your patron and the power in your blood into a single, formidable wellspring of power. You are not as you once were, but you wouldn’t have it otherwise. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Constitution or Intelligence score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20. 
  • Half your warlock levels count as bloodblade levels for the purpose of the Igniting Reach feature.
  • You gain an additional benefit or benefits based on your pact boon or boons:
    • If you have @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.6co2rqjh9npjg3eb]{Pact of the Blade}, your pact weapon always deals an additional 1d8 damage of the type specified by your Sanguine Transferrence when you hit with it. 
    • If you have @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.f2mfiz8spijbzs6h]{Pact of the Chain}, your familiar gains some of your bloodblade toughness. It gains additional hit points equal to your combined bloodblade and warlock levels. It can also make a single Eldritch Blast attack of any type available to you. 
    • If you have @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.2dp9b4a11fuxjwbc]{Pact of the Tome}, half your bloodblade levels count as warlock levels for the purpose of determining when you receive new invocations known. This is retroactive.
